name: Space Fighter (itch) (Vlatko Chankulovski)
description:
In this game you will need to be careful which Targets you are going to destroy . Each target gives +1 score or -1 score .

If you collide with the Dark Targets or if you shoot them , your score will decrease and you will lose 15% of your Energy / Health .

If you collide with the Regular Target, you will only lose 15% of your Energy / Health .

The goal of this game is to kill 150 Regular Targets, once you do that you will be able to proceed to the next Level.

Remember, if you kill the Dark Targets you will decrease your score ( you can even go to minus as well ) .

There are many different weapons pickup that spawns in a random places with limited time to be picked up ( pick them up quickly and use them wisely ) .

WEAPONS :

1. Split Shot : Shooting Projectiles from three sides of the Fighter Jet in a quick succession ( lasts 7 - 10 seconds, then goes back to normal shooting ) ;

2. Power Shot : Single use but powerful Projectile that will kill everything in its radius ( Right - Click to release, then Left - Click to hit and explode, or leave the Projectile to hit anything to activate ) ;

3. Minigun Speed Shot : Fires Projectiles in a very quick succession ( lasts 7 - 10 seconds, then goes back to normal shooting ) .

TRAINING ROOM provided :

In this Room you will have the chance to learn the controls of the Player, how the scoring system works, what you must and you must not do in the game in order to stay alive, learn how to use the Weapons PowerUps etc .

Also in this game there is an Optimization Option, making the game playable on almost every machine regardless of its System Performance ( you can play it even on an older Computer or Laptop) .

DISCLAIMER :

THIS GAME FILE IS SCANNED AND IT'S FREE FROM VIRUSES OR THREADS AT THE MOMENT OF THE SCAN WITH AVIRA ANTIVIRUS PRO ( the proof of the scan is provided in the file ) , THEREFORE, THE DEVELOPER IS NOT RESPONSIBLE IF ANY VIRUSES OR THREADS OCCURS DURING DOWNLOAD OF THIS FILE !
